name: Relapse (SHIRO_No1, Nagispace, Steii, BazTodon)
description:
This game has been made for the Minijam 87 : Break

Controls :
1,2 and 3 for usage of different pills (when in inventory)
Arrow keys to move
Space to dash (destroy orange blocks)

the game is not finished but finishable.
At some point it can become unfinishable due to a bug, when you encounters Two walls, a red and a blue side to side, activate first the blue then the red pill or else you'll get stuck.

we used this asseet for the tileset:
https://scut.itch.io/7drl-tileset-2018

Programming : Shiro, Nagispace

Music : Braven

Level Design : Braven, Steii

Art : Steii
